posts.post_content:
Gonna attempt a low grade Monster... Retirement two yrs away. I'll need activity, when the surf is flat. Don't make me learn macrame'.

I may have the beat up stuff you need... Soo, any stale beans cluttering up your desk?

Trades requested. 

Steve
Don't know if these are beater enough but here they are.  Flick-2 heavy creases, Titus-some paper loss on back, Oldring paper loss on back, elberfeld creased,$110 delivered
LOL. You just sold the monster four times over the last two weeks! Good luck in your quest. Any more cards from the find left to disperse?

I'll help you out if I can.

Best,
Scott
(scottglevy@yahoo.com)
